Description: Job Description:Key areas of Responsibilities :üDownload daily bank statement and post the receipts as per the bank statement within TAT and report unapplied & unidentified cases.üUpdate the blocked order report and release of the orders in timely manner.üUpdate payment trackers, productivity trackers, SLA/KPI on daily basis.üHandle all queries within 24 hours TAT.üMonth end close activities within timeline.Knowledge and Skills Required:üCommerce Graduate(B.Com/M.Com/B.B.A./B.B.M. (Fin)/M.B.A. (Fin)üThorough knowledge of accounting fundamentals and conceptsüStrong in verbal and written communication.üAbility to work independently / with Team and to adopt to a fast changing environment | Organized, set priorities and meet deadlinesüProficiency in MS Office (Excel & Power Point)ü0-1 years of experience in Finance and Accounts domainJob Details
